scene_description_enriched: A female figure with long, flowing red hair and a halo stands against a blue sky. She wears a vibrant blue robe and a reddish-brown mantle adorned with gold trim. In her right hand, she holds a golden chalice containing what appears to be a serpent or dragon, and her left hand is raised, palm open. The background depicts a green landscape with trees and a hint of distant hills. The scene is framed by an arched architectural element with decorative gold detailing.
